parameters.name: n_neighbors
parameters.description: Number of neighbors to use by default for `kneighbors` queries.

parameters.name: leaf_size
parameters.description: Leaf size passed to `BallTree`. This can affect the speed of the construction and query, as well as the memory required to store the tree. The optimal value depends on the nature of the problem.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: 'largest': use the distance to the kth neighbor as the outlier score, 'mean': use the average of all k neighbors as the outlier score, 'median': use the median of the distance to k neighbors as the outlier score.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Range of parameter space to use by default for `radius_neighbors` queries.

parameters.name: distance_metric_order
parameters.description: Parameter for the Minkowski metric from sklearn.metrics.pairwise.pairwise_distances. When p = 1, this is equivalent to using manhattan_distance (l1), and euclidean_distance (l2) for p = 2. For arbitrary p, minkowski_distance (l_p) is used. See http://scikit-learn.org/stable/modules/generated/sklearn.metrics.pairwise.pairwise_distances.

parameters.name: n_jobs
parameters.description: The number of parallel jobs to run for neighbors search. If ``-1``, then the number of jobs is set to the number of CPU cores. Affects only kneighbors and kneighbors_graph methods.
